question: What molecules are the multidrug transporter MDR3 targeting?
ideal_answer: Multidrug-resistant P-glycoprotein 3 (MDR3) is a phospholipid translocator.

snippets.text: Multidrug-resistant P-glycoprotein 3 (MDR3) is a phospholipid translocator
The multiple drug resistance 3 (MDR3) protein is a canalicular phospholipid translocator
The ATP-binding cassette transporter ABCB4/MDR3 is critical for biliary phosphatidylcholine (PC) excretion

exact_answer: Multidrug-resistant P-glycoprotein 3 (MDR3) is a phospholipid translocator
